about.title: About me
about.p1: I'm Nico, an IT support specialist and developer living in Rosario, Argentina. After six years living and working in Barcelona and Berlin, I returned home with experience managing large-scale tech environments and a hands-on approach to solving complex problems.
about.p2: I'm a daily Linux user, which gave me a deep understanding of operating systems and keeps me constantly learning. This experience with Linux allows me to troubleshoot problems from the root and customize work environments according to each project's specific needs.
about.p3: Beyond the technical side, I'm passionate about the intersection of technology and creativity. I play guitar and piano, and I'm a fan of fantasy literature.
about.p4: I believe the best technical solutions come from understanding the people behind the problems.
